synopsis.text: Bundled with the limited edition seventh volume of the My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! manga, this unaired episode takes viewers on a heartwarming journey through the early lives of Catarina Claes' cherished friends. In a collection of touching vignettes, Geordo, Keith, Mary, Alan, Sophia, and Nicol reminisce about the personal struggles they faced before their paths crossed with Catarina's. As they recount their first encounters with the radiant young woman, they reveal how her genuine warmth and unwavering support transformed their lives for the better. This special episode highlights the profound impact Catarina had on each of her friends, ultimately leading to the blossoming of unbreakable bonds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
